channel.title: VM protected binaries
channel.description: Hello low programming lovers, I'm working on a challenge from root me here is the [link](https://www.root-me.org/fr/Challenges/Cracking/ELF-VM) the challenge is called ' ELF-VM' 1... its hell currently I found the vm section of custome opcodes, i think the registers also, but can get far than this I request a hint or tips on how you guys deal with vm protection thank you

item.title: VM protected binaries
item.dc:creator: system
item.description:
This topic was automatically closed 3 days after the last reply. New replies are no longer allowed.
